properties.Name: ComponentGuideline
properties.Description:
Ranges of values associated with a reading on a component and how the results within those ranges should be interpreted and acted upon.

The intent is for this guideline table to contain non-overlapping values from 0 - infinity so that a single value delivered in a reading will have a single test guideline to provide additional data on how to interpret the result.

Columns.Name: ComponentId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Component.

Columns.Name: ReadingTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Reading Type

Columns.Name: MinimumReadingValue
Columns.Description: The minimum value for which this range is applicable.

Columns.Name: MaximumReadingValue
Columns.Description: The maximum value for which this range is applicable.

Columns.Name: UnitOfMeasureId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Unit Of Measure.

Columns.Name: ReadingResultTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Reading Result Type.

Columns.Name: ComponentGuidelineNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Component Guideline.

Properties.Description:
Ranges of values associated with a reading on a component and how the results within those ranges should be interpreted and acted upon.

The intent is for this guideline table to contain non-overlapping values from 0 - infinity so that a single value delivered in a reading will have a single test guideline to provide additional data on how to interpret the result.
